title: The fourme of the othe made by such as haue made their humble submission to the Queenes Maiesties Commissioners, for their offences in the late rebellion begun in the North in Nouember. 1569. and the twelfth yere of the raigne of the Queenes Maiestie, Elizabeth by the grace of God. &c.
author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
publisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
notes: A proclamation giving the form of the oath of submission.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
